All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Chat
Interface for controlling the chat workflow of the mycrocast sdk.
Chat.Observer
 
ChatMessage
 
ChatMessageSender
Enum for the source of the chat message
ChatRoomStatus
The status of a chat for an active stream.
ErrorReceiving
Interface that will be informed, if an error occurs somewhere in the sdk.
ErrorReceiving.Observer
The interface to be implemented to register as observer.
LiveStream
This class represents a single live stream (a live broadcast started by a user from within the mycrocast app)
LiveStreamContainer
The interface in handling the live stream and live stream updates.
LiveStreamContainer.Observer
 
LiveStreamListener
Interface to control the audio play as well as receiving advertisements to receive for the current stream
LiveStreamListener.Observer
Implement this interface to receive information for receiving audio related updates for the LiveStream as well as get notified when new advertisements to play are queued
LiveStreamListenerFactory
Use this class to initialise the play of the provided live stream
LiveStreamListenerState
Interface to use for determining the play state for the livestreams
LiveStreamListenerState.Observer
Implement this interface to receive updates for the livestreams play state
LiveStreamPlayer
 
LiveStreamPlayer.Observer
Implement this interface for receiving audio related information
LiveStreamRater
The live stream rater is used for rating related interaction with any live stream.
LiveStreamRater.Observer
 
LiveStreamRating
Enum values representing the rating state of a specific live stream
LiveStreamRefresher
Interface providing the functionality of refreshing the list of currently active liveStreams (of your club) from the server
LiveStreamRefresher.Observer
 
Mycrocast
Entry point to access the different parts of the android sdk.
MycrocastError
Class describing an received error from the sdk This consist of an ErrorType and some additional information to help the developer make the most out of it
Optional<T>
 
PlayState
Enum representing the current play state
ReportReason
Enum describing the values available to report a chat user/ chat message for.
Scoring
This class can be part of the LiveStream in case the streamer decided to start a scoring stream.
SpotBanner
The configured spot banner containing an image, a target website to be moved to when clicked and a description to be shown with the banner
SpotPlay
Received when want to play an advertisement and providing all information required to do so
StreamLanguage
Represents the language of the stream, as selected by the streamer
Team
A team is always part of a Scoring and belongs to a LiveStream A team consist of 2 information, the name of the team and the current scoring of the team as configured and updated by the streamer
